title: Patents
description: Helps clients secure patents for their inventions and provides legal advice on patent rights and infringement issues.

title: Trade Marks
description: Specializes in trademark registration, protection, and enforcement to ensure brand security.

title: Copyright
description: Assists with protecting original creative works like books, music, and software through copyright registration and litigation.

title: Internet Law
description: Handles legal issues related to online business, digital content, privacy, and cybersecurity.

title: Counseling & License
description: Provides legal counseling and helps with licensing agreements for intellectual property and technology.

title: Litigation
description: Represents clients in court and handles all aspects of IP disputes and enforcement actions.
